Postdoctoral researcher at [Inria](https://www.inria.fr/fr) and [LNCC](https://www.gov.br/lncc/pt-br), research assistant at [Fiocruz](https://portal.fiocruz.br/).

Health geographer and health data scientist. Undergraduate in Geography, specialization in Statistics, master's in Public Health, and Ph.D. in Health Information.

Brazilian from Nova Friburgo (RJ), lived for several years on Minas Gerais and Rio de Janeiro. Currently based on Montpellier, France.

Loves to code and crunch huge health and climate datasets with R.
